trigger.title: Trigger: Bred Animals
trigger.description: Triggers after the player breeds 2 animals.

conditions.title: Conditions
conditions.description: Object containing conditions that need to be met when the trigger gets activated. The criterion is marked completed when the trigger activates and all conditions passed.

anyOf.description: Specifies a list of predicates that must pass in order for the criterion to be granted. The origin of the predicate is the position of the player that would get the advancement.
Checks properties of the child that results from the breeding.
Specifies a list of predicates that must pass in order for the criterion to be granted. The origin of the predicate is the position of the player that would get the advancement.
Specifies a list of predicates that must pass in order for the criterion to be granted. The origin of the predicate is the position of the player that would get the advancement.
Checks properties of the partner. (The entity the parent was bred with).
